content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Return the value of PI:
<?php
echo(pi());
?>

Definition and Usage
The pi() function returns the value of PI.
Tip:
The named constant M_PI is identical to pi().
Syntax
pi();
Technical Details
Return Value:
3.1415926535898
Return Type:
Float
PHP Version:
4+

★
+1
